nodes.text: The High-Yield Universal Institutional Savings Account was a Galactic Republic savings account that parents could establish in the name of their children. It was known to be one of the most profitable and stable accounts available. With an excellent yearly return rate, it was used to finance the pursuit of education throughout the galaxy. The Mandalorian bounty hunter, Jango Fett established one for his son, Boba, before he was killed during the Battle of Geonosis.
